title: AI-based discovery (augment human discovery)
summary: Use AI to accelerate understanding of integrations by extracting flows, contracts, and dependencies from artifacts.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Organizations lack visibility into what BizTalk/middleware actually does; manual discovery is slow and incomplete.
whenToUse: You have code, configs, maps, logs, tickets, or docs to mine
whenNotToUse: You lack access to artifacts or telemetry
Outputs cannot be validated by SMEs

thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: AI produces hypotheses. Humans validate and turn them into contracts, owners, and backlog slices.

complexity.rationale: Faster discovery but requires disciplined validation.
complexity.skillDemand: AI tooling literacy + architecture analysis skill.
complexity.operationalDemand: Moderateâ€”requires secure data handling and auditability.

realWorldExample.approach: Used AI to summarize orchestration intent, maps, and dependencies; validated in workshops.
realWorldExample.outcome: Compressed time-to-understanding and reduced missed dependencies.
